channel.title: How to paste Soundcloud tracks in this forum?
channel.description: How do you upload tracks from sound cloud to here I can't seem to find links to copy and paste

item.title: How to paste Soundcloud tracks in this forum?
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
The methods suggested here overcomplicate the process. In general, you can select the url in your url bar and copy that and it’ll link you to the page you’re currently on. This works on a desktop or on mobile, with the exception of the SoundCloud app itself.

item.title: How to paste Soundcloud tracks in this forum?
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
Go to your track on SoundCloud, and hit that little box symbol with an upwards arrow. Then hit copy and it will copy the link to your track. Then paste here
For mobile**

item.title: How to paste Soundcloud tracks in this forum?
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Just copy the URL for that tracks webpage.

Then, this link explains how and where to post & name your thread.

How to post your Auxy Tracks? Work in Progress
To ensure your Auxy tracks are visible and easy to browse, here’s some guidelines for posting your Auxy tracks. How to Post Your Auxy Tracks Post your completed track in the #tracks category OR, click here One thread per track, LP or album. Post your Work In Progress tracks in the #WIP category OR, click here One thread per track, LP or album. Threads should be named: [Track_Name] - [Artist] eg: Sonic Passion - StinkFace Tracks without a name can be called: “Untitled - …

Read full topic
